group_1.textRight: Okay, let's start making some accessories!
First we need to think about the concept.

group_1.textLeft: Concept...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, your design's concept.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmmmmmmm...

group_1.textRight: Looks like you can't come up with anything...@No ideas at all...?
It's not easy if you're not used to it.
If you can't come up with anything, you can@use one of mine.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, it's not that I don't have anything I want@to make.
It's just...when I try to use one of your@accessories as reference...
They're all too good... I can't narrow it down@to one.

group_1.textRight: Matsuri...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I'm sorry.@My phone, where's my phone...
Hello...

group_1.textRight: Ahhh, Matsuri? I’ll just tell you in advance:@Sorry.

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what's wrong...?

group_1.textRight: It's the taiyaki shop! The taiyaki shop!
I took a peek at it on the way to the concert.@But...

group_1.textLeft: Uh-huh...

group_1.textRight: The store was closed!
Today's their day off!

group_1.textLeft: What?!

group_1.textRight: So, I’m wondering what to do after the concert...
We have to change our plans for the evening,@right?

group_1.textLeft: That's...! Hold on!@I'm already in the mood for taiyaki...

group_1.textRight: I know... But there's nothing we can do about@the fact that it's closed.

group_1.textLeft: Alright!

group_1.textRight: Matsuri?

group_1.textLeft: Then I'll search for a taiyaki shop!

group_1.textRight: You don't know much about Kamihama!@Are you gonna be okay?!
I see, the store is closed.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, so I decided to look for one to replace it.

group_1.textRight: I see... There are probably plenty of standard@taiyaki places open, but...
That won't cut it, right?

group_1.textLeft: That's right, I want taiyaki that will make me@remember my trip to Kamihama!

group_1.textRight: Ah, like locally made taiyaki?

group_1.textLeft: Good idea! Locally made taiyaki!

group_1.textRight: Although I said that, I don't know if something@like that actually exists...

group_1.textLeft: That's it!

group_1.textRight: Hmm?

group_1.textLeft: I've got a concept!

group_1.textRight: For what...?

group_1.textLeft: For the accessory we're going to make!

group_1.textRight: Oh, that's good! Then let's get started!
...Although I feel like the conversation derailed.
Lastly...do this here...like this...then this!

group_1.textLeft: Do this here...like this...then this!
[chara:403201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's finished!

group_1.textRight: Well done.

group_1.textLeft: Hooray! I'm so happy!@Thank you, Kanoko!

group_1.textRight: No problem!
By the way, that design is...taiyaki...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, they're taiyaki earrings!
Just like how the scrunchie's mushrooms@became a real, delicious mushroom...
I hope these earrings will guide me to real,@delicious taiyaki.

group_1.textRight: I see... Like a good luck charm.
Accessories are also used as good luck charms,@good thinking.

group_1.textLeft: Okay, let's go!
To find the best taiyaki in Kamihama!
And while we're at it, sightsee Kamihama!

group_1.textCenter: It's so exciting to be in a town you don't know!@I want to see more of this place!
